sections.summary:
Motivated teaching professional with over 25 years' experience addressing student needs and ensuring proper student social/emotional
development.
Core Qualifications
Experience working special needs students
School improvement committee Effectively work with parents
Positive atmosphere promotion Differentiated instruction
Active participation in Truancy Committee Behavior modification
Administrative management Instructional best practices
Goal setting and implementation
